function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapidly modified healthcare facilities may lead to increased risk of cross-contamination and spread of diseases.","Impact":"Potential for higher infection rates and greater strain on healthcare facilities.","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitation protocols and regular disinfection practices in healthcare facilities.","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection technologies such as UV-C light and electrostatic sprayers.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and visitors to healthcare facilities.","Owner":"Healthcare management and facilities maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Increased power consumption after lockdown may lead to higher pollution levels and environmental health risks.","Impact":"Potential increase in air pollutants and negative impact on public health.","Mitigation":"Encourage the use of renewable energy sources and energy-efficient technologies to reduce pollution.","Technologies":"Renewable energy sources such as solar and wind power, and energy-efficient appliances and vehicles.","People":"General public, especially those with respiratory conditions.","Owner":"Government and environmental agencies."},{"Description":"Inadequate coordination and compliance with public health measures may lead to greater transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Higher infection rates and potential resurgence of pandemics.","Mitigation":"Promote public education, awareness, and enforcement of social distancing and preventive measures.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, public health campaigns, and telehealth platforms for remote consultations.","People":"General public, government officials, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, and community leaders."}]}
